uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.owl.build

Class OBOptimisingSectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.owl.build.OBSectionBuilder
      • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.owl.build.OBOptimisingSectionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CSectionBuilder

    public class OBOptimisingSectionBuilder
extends OBSectionBuilder
    Specialisation of OBSectionBuilder that builds the OWL-derived section of the frames-based model in a manner that optimises both the initial classification and all subsequent reasoning. Specifically, loads two versions of the OWL model:
    • "Main" version, with the specified reasoner attached, and from which all "payload" constructs will be removed prior to creation of the reasoner
    • "Payload Loading" version, with all original constructs present, but with only a basic structural reasoner attached

    ("Payload" constructs refers to those sub-class axioms in which the LHS is a named class, and the RHS a restriction. The assumption being that any inferences involving such axioms will all be handled by the frames-model, and hence the axioms do not need to be handled by the reasoner. Such axioms are also known to cause massive increases in typical reasoning times.)

    These two versions of the model are then used to build overlapping sections of the frames-based model, whilst only the main version is attached to the ORClassifier object that is created as part of the section-building process. The result of all this is that the required frames-model will be built, and should behave in the required fashion as regards to reasoning, whilst the lack of payload constructs in the ontology against which the actual reasoning is done, greatly improves the efficiency both of the initial classification and of all subsequent reasoning via the ORClassifier.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OBOptimisingSectionBuilder(uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config.KConfigNode parentConfigNode)

      OBOptimisingSectionBuilder(OModelBuilder modelBldr, uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config.KConfigNode parentConfigNode)
      Constructs section-builder with specified model-builder, which will be used in modified form for each of two models over which the sanctioning is to operate, and with configuration defined via the appropriately-tagged child of the specified parent-configuration-node.

      void build(CBuilder builder)
      Builds or updates the model-section from the set of OWL ontologies via the standard sanctioning mechanism, in a manner that optimises both the initial classification and all subsequent reasoning (see OBOptimisingSectionBuilder).

    • Constructor Detail

      • OBOptimisingSectionBuilder

        public OBOptimisingSectionBuilder(uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config.KConfigNode parentConfigNode)
        Constructs section-builder with configuration defined via the appropriately-tagged child of the specified parent-configuration-node. The configuration should also include:
        • Configuration applicable to the two versions of the OModel over which the sanctioning is to operate (though the specified reasoner will only be attached to the main version)
        • The ORClassifier object to be attached to all generated frames
        Parameters:
        parentConfigNode - Parent of configuration node defining appropriate configuration information
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KConfigException - if required child-node does not exist or does not contain correctly specified configuration information

      • OBOptimisingSectionBuilder

        public OBOptimisingSectionBuilder(OModelBuilder modelBldr,
                                  uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.config.KConfigNode parentConfigNode)
        Constructs section-builder with specified model-builder, which will be used in modified form for each of two models over which the sanctioning is to operate, and with configuration defined via the appropriately-tagged child of the specified parent-configuration-node. The configuration should also include:
        • Configuration for an ORClassifier object to be attached to all generated frames
        Parameters:
        modelBldr - Builder for models over which sanctioning is to operate
        parentConfigNode - Parent of configuration node defining appropriate configuration information
        Throws:
        uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KConfigException - if required child-node does not exist or does not contain correctly specified configuration information
